mapper.select: select id, appid, openid, meat_day, meat_time, feedback_type, problem_description, content, image, phone, ctime, status from wx_order.wx_feedback where id = #{id}
select id, appid, openid, meat_day, meat_time, feedback_type, problem_description, content, image, phone, ctime, status from wx_order.wx_feedback limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_order.wx_feedback(appid, openid, meat_day, meat_time, feedback_type, problem_description, content, image, phone, ctime, status) values (#{appid}, #{openid}, #{meatDay}, #{meatTime}, #{feedbackType}, #{problemDescription}, #{content}, #{image}, #{phone}, now(), #{status})
mapper.update:
update wx_order.wx_feedback
appid = #{appid},
openid = #{openid},
meat_day = #{meatDay},
meat_time = #{meatTime},
feedback_type = #{feedbackType},
problem_description = #{problemDescription},
content = #{content},
image = #{image},
phone = #{phone},
ctime = #{ctime},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
